abstract: Banco Santander is to buy Bank of America’s stake for $2.5 billion, giving it almost total control of the subsidiary.
snippet: Banco Santander is to buy Bank of America’s stake for $2.5 billion, giving it almost total control of the subsidiary.
lead_paragraph: Banco Santander, the Spanish bank, said on Wednesday that it would buy Bank of America’s 24.9 percent stake in Santander’s Mexican arm for $2.5 billion, giving it almost total ownership of the unit.

headline.main: Spanish Bank to Buy Larger Stake in Mexican Unit
headline.print_headline: Spanish Bank to Buy Larger Stake in Mexican Unit
